entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 24.

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 17. entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Clearing in the evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 26.
